title: Image Segmentation With Hierarchical Clustering
description: In this lab, we will learn how to use hierarchical clustering to segment a 2D image. Hierarchical clustering is a clustering algorithm that groups similar data points together. In the context of image segmentation, hierarchical clustering can be used to group pixels with similar color intensities together, which can be useful in identifying distinct regions or objects in an image.

meta.title: Image Segmentation With Hierarchical Clustering
meta.description: Learn how to use hierarchical clustering for image segmentation, identifying distinct regions and objects in an image.
meta.keywords: image segmentation, hierarchical clustering, pixel clustering, object detection, image processing
